title: "3 2 1 Contact" stencil geometric sans
content:
80's TV show, dont really like the font but need it for a throwback design, any ideas if this was made as a font...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120718065326im_/http:/typophile.com/files/321_Contact2_5837.png)
author: Locash

comments.content:
No idea about the typeface, but thanks so much for the flashback.  
---

The closest I can get you is [Glaser Stencil](http://web.archive.org/web/20120718065326/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&startrow=1&records=100&currpage=1&totalrecords=6&searchby=&searchID=&searchletter=&searchstr=glaser&font_categories_checkbox=font_name_search&fontRendererText=CONTACT).

The theme song is also a delightful flashback. Was [featured](http://web.archive.org/web/20120718065326/http:/www.callsandresponses.com/2006/04/8_tom_anthony_3.html) on our music blog a few weeks ago.
Oh man, I remember watching this show growing up!

<cite>I remember watching this show growing up!</cite>

And did it ever grow up?
I suspect it was hand-drawn. It wouldn't have been difficult to do.
